description: Les petites cantines is a network of participatory neighborhood restaurants founded in 2016, promoting sustainable food, free pricing, and community involvement. With 14 canteens across France, it serves over 60,000 meals annually, welcoming around 19,000 diners each year. The initiative encourages local engagement and aims to transform societal relationships through shared meals, fostering trust and connection among diverse community members. Each canteen operates as an independent association, guided by the network's core values.
name: Les Petites Cantines
